long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Turn your Chrome's new tab page into macOS's gorgeous screensaver aerial videos.

ğŸ–¥ï¸ If you're not using macOS, fear not! This extension remains compatible.

This Chrome extension delivers the following features:

ğŸ¥ Enhance your Chrome start page and new tab view with breathtaking 4K videos, taken directly from macOS' native aerial screen savers.
ğŸŒ¦ï¸ Receive up-to-the-minute weather updates accompanied by a 3-day forecast.
ğŸ’¬ Search everything with Google/ChatGPT/Bing/Duckduckgo.
ğŸŒŸ Discover motivational quotes that change randomly with each new tab.
ğŸ”— Compile your browsing history from the chosen timeframe and offer a quick-access list for your convenience.
ğŸ˜‘ Zen mode, you can comfortably space out while accompanied by carefully selected music and watching videos.

After installing, please follow the instrutions in the options page, after you finish the configuraton, you can enjoy the macOS screen saver video as Chrome's new tab.
